blog.title: OT3 is Life
blog.description: All fics are posted automatically. Thanks to nikkiyan for the avi

title: after death do us part
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2GoLGip

by ethydium

Midoriya ends up in Hell, where he is greeted by a tall, gorgeous demon named Todoroki. They immediately hit it off, and Midoriya is fortunate enough to start this new chapter of his ‘life’ with a friend at his side. There are a lot of things he needs to get used to, like being permanently dead after leaving behind his old life and his friends. Including Bakugou, his life long crush, who he never managed to confess to. Bummer.

And sure, the dead stay dead, there’s no doubt about that, but Bakugou couldn’t and *wouldn’t* stay in a different dimension than Midoriya.

Words: 4029, Chapters: 1/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: 僕のヒーローアカデミア | Boku no Hero Academia | My Hero Academia
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Midoriya Izuku, Bakugou Katsuki, Todoroki Shouto, Class 1-A (My Hero Academia)
  • Relationships: Bakugou Katsuki/Midoriya Izuku/Todoroki Shouto, Bakugou Katsuki/Midoriya Izuku, Midoriya Izuku/Todoroki Shouto, Bakugou Katsuki/Todoroki Shouto
  • Additional Tags: Alternate Universe, Alternate Universe - Canon Divergence, Demon Todoroki Shouto, Prince of Hell Todoroki Shouto, Prince Todoroki Shouto, Fluff and Angst, Angst with a Happy Ending, Emotional Hurt/Comfort, Misunderstandings, Happy Ending, Other Additional Tags to Be Added, Explicit Sexual Content, True Love, Alternate Universe - Pro Heroes (My Hero Academia), Pro Hero Midoriya Izuku, Pro Hero Bakugou Katsuki, Aged-Up Character(s), Mutual Pining, Friends to Lovers, Bedsharing


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2GoLGip

blog.name: bnhagalposts
blog.title: Bnha Headcannons and Match-ups
blog.description: Hello, Guys, Gals, and Non-binary pals! Welcome to my humble Bnha Headcanons and Match-ups! REQUESTS ARE CURRENTLY OPEN BUT, I'M ONLY TAKING HEADCANONS RIGHT NOW!!! Thank you!

summary: Can you do the girls (Uraraka, Jirou, and Momo) being carried bridal style for their female s/o?
question: Can you do the girls (Uraraka, Jirou, and Momo) being carried bridal style for their female s/o?
answer:
Uraraka:

-Overusing her quirk, Uraraka felt nauseous and tired, she just wanted to go to bed. She just felt tired and drained.

-Uraraka was then swooped up in her girlfriend’s arms, it immediately waking her up. “S/O!? What are you doing?”

-”Making sure that my lovely girlfriend is okay!” Uraraka’s S/O smiled sweetly, her look full of love.

-”S/O I’m fine you don’t have to carry me.” Uraraka softly replied, loosening her arms around her girlfriend’s neck, not wanting to burden them.

-”Nope” She popped the ‘p’ when she spoke before kissing Uraraka and making her blush. Uraraka giggled, then leaning into her lover’s embrace.



Jirou:

-Jirou and her girlfriend were happily singing along to Disney songs and laughing. Singing to the verses of “Love is an open door” Jirou was suddenly swooped up in her lover’s arms.

-”And it’s nothing like I’ve ever known before~” Her S/O sweetly sang, rocking her girlfriend back and forth in her arms.

-Jirou snorted and rolled her eyes “Love is an open door~” Jirou sang back, snuggling into her girlfriend’s arms, enjoying her happy spirits.

-”Love is an open door~”  S/O continued the verse, smiling widely.

-”Love is an open door~” Jirou finished the lyrics before kissing her lover on the lips, peppering them affection.



Momo:

-Momo was starting to feel a bit peckish after using her quirk and decided to head to the kitchen to whip up a meal.

-Before Momo knew it she was in her girlfriend’s arms, Momo laughed a bit while blushing “What are you doing, my love?”

-”Making sure the goddess Momo, is well taken care of.” She then kissed Momo’s cheeks “I’ll make you something.” She smiled while carrying Momo, then plopping her girlfriend down on the chair.

-”S/O-” Momo’s complaint was shushed and a tasty meal was cooked for her.

-”Gosh, I love you S/O!”



I hope you enjoyed and have a great day!

Ophelia

blog.name: bnhagalposts
blog.title: Bnha Headcannons and Match-ups
blog.description: Hello, Guys, Gals, and Non-binary pals! Welcome to my humble Bnha Headcanons and Match-ups! REQUESTS ARE CURRENTLY OPEN BUT, I'M ONLY TAKING HEADCANONS RIGHT NOW!!! Thank you!

summary: Could I get a BNHA matchup? I’m a 5’2 girl with short brown and red curly hair. I know every meme and vine out there, and I...
question: Could I get a BNHA matchup? I’m a 5’2 girl with short brown and red curly hair. I know every meme and vine out there, and I absolutely love Gordon Ramsay. I love horror movies and sitcoms, and I love drawing. I frequently volunteer at pet shelters and hang with the cats, and I hate going outside. I’m quiet and reserved at first, but once I’m comfortable with you I won’t shut up. I love winter, drinking cocoa and sitting by the fireplace with a cat in my lap and watching Friends is my Aesthetic
answer:
I would match you up with Shinsou. Shinsou can always enjoy a fellow meme lover and he always snorts in laughter when he’s with you. You both just quote Gordon Ramsay and tend to watch his many shows when you two have time together (and cuddle of course). Shinsou is a fellow animal lover and on the weekends loves to help out at the pet shelters with you. He’s probably planning to adopt every animal there and just give them tons of affection and of course you join in giving the animals affection with him. He wouldn’t mind your more quiet nature at first but, would love to see you open up to him. He can definitely get behind sitting close by the fireplace with some cocoa, usually cuddling both you and the cats. You two always have sweet moments, where you two just relax and watch a variety of t.v. shows, just basically loving on each other and sharing a blanket.



I hope you enjoyed and have a great day!

Ophelia

tags: have some of the disaster teachers
summary:
Aizawa: I love you.
Yamada, with his hearing aids out: You love shoe?
Aizawa: No, I love you.
Yamada: You love glue?
Aizawa,...
body:
Aizawa: I love you.
Yamada, with his hearing aids out: You love shoe?
Aizawa: No, I love you.
Yamada: You love glue?
Aizawa, looking a bit peeved: I. Love. You!
Yamada, grinning: You love Scooby-Dooby-Doo?

dialogue.name: Yamada, with his hearing aids out
dialogue.label: Yamada, with his hearing aids out:

I’ve decided to post this on my art account (my main is @mysticghoulonice!)

I’m the confessor for @bellare-draws for the @tododekuvalentine thing! It was fun doing this, I’m sorry if Todoroki is a little out of character.

I so look forward to seeing your art! Happy Valentine’s day! :)
